someone who works in an office typing letters, keeping records, answering telephone calls, arranging meetings etc
My secretary will fax you all the details.
the head of an important department in the British government
an official in charge of a large government department in the US
a British official who works in a government department or embassy and is below the rank of minister or ambassador
the First Secretary at the British Embassy
a member of a club or organization who takes notes in meetings, writes official letters etc
the secretary of the tennis club
someone who works in an office helping to organize the work, answering the telephone, arranging meetings etc
His personal secretary (=one working for only him) handles all his appointments.
someone who works for a large organization and who is responsible for running its daily affairs
the general secretary of the European Confederation of trade unions
a government official in charge of a particular department or area of work
He has been appointed Secretary of State for Health.
